DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman , singleton pregnancy , gestational age 2434 week , Fetal growth restriction . Intact membrane . Abnormal umbilical artery Doppler waveform . Fetal abdominal circumference tenth percentile . Normal venous fetal Doppler Undetermined gestational age . Intrauterine infection .
